snippet: Thousands of Medicaid health care providers still got paid by the government even though they owed hundreds of millions of dollars in federal taxes, Congressional investigators say.
abstract: Congressional investigators say thousands of Medicaid health care providers still got paid by the government even though they owed hundreds of millions of dollars in federal taxes; say that a legal technicality is making it harder for the Internal Revenue Service to collect.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of Medicaid health care providers still got paid by the government even though they owed hundreds of millions of dollars in federal taxes, Congressional investigators say.
